00029 Sortie& Matrice_Nulle::printOn( Sortie& os ) const
00030 {
00031   os << nb_lines_   << finl;
00032   os << nb_columns_ << finl;
00033   return os;
00034 }

00037 {
00038   is >> nb_lines_;
00039   is >> nb_columns_;
00040   return is;

00042 
00043 int Matrice_Nulle::ordre() const
00044 {
00045   assert( nb_lines_   > 0 );
00046   assert( nb_columns_ > 0 );
00047 
00048   if ( nb_lines_ == nb_columns_ )
00049     {
00050       return nb_lines_;
00051     }
00052   return -1;
00053 }
00054 
00055 int Matrice_Nulle::nb_lignes() const
00056 {
00057   assert( nb_lines_   > 0 );
00058   assert( nb_columns_ > 0 );
00059   return nb_lines_;
00060 }

00063 {
00064   assert( nb_lines_   > 0 );
00065   assert( nb_columns_ > 0 );
00066   return nb_columns_;

00098 void Matrice_Nulle::get_stencil( IntTab& stencil ) const
00099 {
00100   stencil.resize( 0, 2 );
00101 }
00102 
00103 void Matrice_Nulle::get_symmetric_stencil( IntTab& stencil ) const
00104 {
00105   if ( nb_lines_ != nb_columns_ )
00106     {
00107       Cerr << "Error in 'Matrice_Nulle::get_symmetric_stencil( )':" << finl;
00108       Cerr << "  Matrix is not square." << finl;
00109       Cerr << "  nb_lines   = " << nb_lines_ << finl;
00110       Cerr << "  nb_columns = " << nb_columns_ << finl;
00111       Cerr << "  Exiting..." << finl;
00112       Process::exit( );
00113     }
00114   get_stencil( stencil );
00115 }
00116 
00117 void Matrice_Nulle::get_stencil_and_coefficients( IntTab&      stencil,
00118                                                   ArrOfDouble& coefficients ) const
00119 {
00120   stencil.resize( 0, 2 );
00121   coefficients.resize( 0 );
00122 }
00123 
00124 void Matrice_Nulle::get_symmetric_stencil_and_coefficients( IntTab&      stencil,
00125                                                             ArrOfDouble& coefficients ) const
00126 {
00127   if ( nb_lines_ != nb_columns_ )
00128     {
00129       Cerr << "Error in 'Matrice_Nulle::get_symmetric_stencil_and_coefficients( )':" << finl;
00130       Cerr << "  Matrix is not square." << finl;
00131       Cerr << "  nb_lines   = " << nb_lines_ << finl;
00132       Cerr << "  nb_columns = " << nb_columns_ << finl;
00133       Cerr << "  Exiting..." << finl;
00134       Process::exit( );
00135     }
00136   get_stencil_and_coefficients( stencil,
00137                                 coefficients );
00138 }

00142   nb_lines_   = -1;
00143   nb_columns_ = -2;

00165   nb_columns_ = order;

00167 
00168 void Matrice_Nulle::dimensionner( int nb_lines, int nb_columns )
00169 {
00170   assert( nb_lines   > 0 );
00171   assert( nb_columns > 0 );
00172   nb_lines_ = nb_lines;
00173   nb_columns_ = nb_columns;
00174 }
00175 
00176 double Matrice_Nulle::coeff( int i, int j ) const
00177 {
00178   assert( nb_lines_   > 0 );
00179   assert( nb_columns_ > 0 );
00180   return 0.0;
00181 }
